skill.name: safe_store: Core Initialization & Configuration
skill.description: Fundamental setup patterns for SafeStore with different database types, vectorizers, and configurations
skill.content:
## SafeStore Initialization Patterns
### 1. Basic File-Based Store ```python from safe_store import SafeStore
# Standard persistent database store = SafeStore( db_path="my_knowledge_base.db", vectorizer_name="st", vectorizer_config={"model": "all-MiniLM-L6-v2"} ) ```
### 2. In-Memory Store (Temporary) ```python from safe_store import SafeStore, IN_MEMORY_DB_INDICATOR
# For testing or ephemeral data - no persistence store = SafeStore(db_path=IN_MEMORY_DB_INDICATOR) ```
### 3. Temporary File Store ```python from safe_store import SafeStore, TEMP_FILE_DB_INDICATOR
# Auto-creates temp file, cleaned up on close store = SafeStore(db_path=TEMP_FILE_DB_INDICATOR) ```
### 4. Encrypted Store ```python from safe_store import SafeStore
store = SafeStore( db_path="encrypted_store.db", vectorizer_name="st", vectorizer_config={"model": "all-MiniLM-L6-v2"}, encryption_key="my-secure-password-123" ) ```
